customer_info

Class PaymentMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • customer_info.PaymentMethod

  • public class PaymentMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents PaymentMethod which stores the Payer object.

    Title : ICT373 Assignment 1, Question 2 - Personalised Magazine Service Author : Madyarini Grace Ariel Date : 12/6/2019 Filename : PaymentMethod.java Purpose : Contains the PaymentMethod class implementation as well as setter and getter methods.
